column5: ['Elements of an object include: name, type, hierarchical information, preferences, etc', "If the goals data-usage information mined from the P3P policy match those from the user's privacy preferences corresponding to either accepting or rejecting a policy, the policy should be accepted or rejected respectively", '- OPT in /out preferences', 'This involves obtainingparsing the respective documents- privacy policy documents or the user’s privacy preferences and deriving the goalspertinent rules from them', 'Here the goalsinformation pertaining necessary to accepting as well as rejecting a policy according to user’s privacy preferences are extracted', 'If the goals data-usage information mined from the P3P policy does not match those from the user’s privacy preferences corresponding to either acceptance or and rejection of a policy, then again a conflict should be detected and a notification requiring user’s intervention raised', 'Requirement Specification: The system shall allow analysts to associate privacy preferences with objects', 'Requirement Specification: The system will provide users an unambiguous way to evaluate the information extracted from the privacy policy against the information extracted from the user’s privacy preferences', '- General User Preference', 'This section contains references used in this document', 'Elements of a privacy preference include: purpose, recipient, retention, consent, etc']
